alert.note: Alert for Southern Meade Co Plains; Sturgis, Piedmont Foot Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 01 at 1:53AM MST until January 03 at 12:00AM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO MIDNIGHT MST MONDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 7 inches. * WHERE...The Sturgis/Piedmont Foot Hills and the Southern Meade County Plains. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to midnight MST Monday night. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Road conditions are available on your smartphone from the 5 1 1 app for your state.

area.areaDesc: Southern Meade Co Plains; Sturgis, Piedmont Foot Hills
